name: GeetaShlok
0:
”Alexa geeta shlok”
”Alexa ask geeta shlok to tell me a shlok”
”Alexa ask geeta shlok to give me a shlok”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: geeta shlok
Developer Terms of Use
des:
The Bhagavad Gita "The Song of God" often referred to as the Gita, is a 700 verse Hindu scripture in Sanskrit that is part of the Hindu epic Mahabharata (chapters 23–40 of the 6th book of Mahabharata).
This skill recites English version of some of those shlokas.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
